item.description:
Deidra has discovered a fun new franco-venue in Portland, ME. The "Merry Table" Crêperie is "so French!" and hosts French Night with traditional music (accordion?) twice a month. Many people who work at The Merry Table speak French, and on French Night, Francophones are encouraged to come chat avec tout le monde. Tout cela me semble très amusant! There is no minimum order, so feel free to attend even if you don't want to eat.

Because seating is limited, Deidra will reserve a table a couple of days before the date, so please make an effort to get your RSVP in early -- and change your RSVP if your plans change. Also, after RSVPs are in, we'll try to organize a carpool (from Portsmouth, Wells, or wherever makes the most sense) leaving up to 1 hour prior. Merci beaucoup et à bientôt!

Find more information about The "Merry Table" Crêperie on Facebook.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask to be seated with Deidra's French group.

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: French Night at the "Merry Table" Crêperie, Portland
